csw.services.location.internal

Class LocationServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.services.location.internal.LocationServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    csw.services.location.scaladsl.LocationService

    public class LocationServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements csw.services.location.scaladsl.LocationService
    Registers a Location against connection name in LWWRegister and then Connection to Location in LWWMap. A Future is returned with Failure : 

    
     - If the connection name is already present in LWWRegister
     - If update in LWWRegister fails then LWWMap will not be updated
     - If update in LWWRegister is successful but LWWMap failed (This breaks the atomicity of
         data being present in LWWRegister as well as LWWMap. The user is expected to register
         again with the same Registration to make data consistent)

    If update in LWWRegister and LWWMap is successful then a Future is returned with RegistrationResult

      • unregister

        public scala.concurrent.Future<akka.Done> unregister(Connection connection)
        Unregisters Location for Connection from LWWRegister and then from LWWMap. A Future is returned with Failure : 

        
     - If update in LWWRegister fails then LWWMap will not be updated
     - If update in LWWRegister is successful but LWWMap failed (This breaks the atomicity of
         data being present in LWWRegister as well as LWWMap. The user is expected to unregister
         again with the same Connection to make data consistent)

        If update in LWWRegister and LWWMap is successful then a Future is returned with Success

        Specified by:

      • unregisterAll

        public scala.concurrent.Future<akka.Done> unregisterAll()
        List all locations from LWWMap and unregister them one after another. A Future is returned with Success if all locations are unregistered successfully or will Failure if list from LWWMap fails or un-registration of any of the location fails
        Specified by:
        unregisterAll in interface csw.services.location.scaladsl.LocationService

        (undocumented)

      • resolve

        public scala.concurrent.Future<scala.Option<Location>> resolve(Connection connection)
        List all entries from LWWMap and find a Location for the given Connection. A Future is returned with None if no location is found or with Failure if list from LWWMap fails
        Specified by:

      • list

        public scala.concurrent.Future<scala.collection.immutable.List<Location>> list()
        List all entries from LWWMap and complete the Future with Location values. A Future is returned with empty list if no constant key is found for LWWMap. The returned Future will fail if list from LWWMap fails
        Specified by:
        list in interface csw.services.location.scaladsl.LocationService

      • list

        public scala.concurrent.Future<scala.collection.immutable.List<Location>> list(ComponentType componentType)
        List all locations from LWWMap and complete the Future with Location values filtered on ComponentType. A Future is returned with empty list if no constant key is found for LWWMap or no locations are registered against the given ComponentType. The returned Future will fail if list from LWWMap fails

      • track

        public akka.stream.scaladsl.Source<TrackingEvent,akka.stream.KillSwitch> track(Connection connection)
        Creates an ActorRef that subscribes for Changed messages for a given Connection from LWWRegister and pass it to Source. The Source will then map the Changed event to LocationUpdated if the LWWRegister contains the Location against Connection or to LocationRemoved if there is no value against Connection.

        Un-track a given connection using KillSwitch

        Specified by:
        track in interface csw.services.location.scaladsl.LocationService
        Parameters:
        connection - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
